title: New: Maria Kelly – Threads Feat. Ailbhe Reddy
body:
This is gorgeous.

**Maria Kelly** teams up with **Ailbhe Reddy** on her first new material of the year, in the form of the heartbreakingly beautiful _Threads_. There’s a real emotional rawness to the songwriting; it almost feels like spilling your heart onto paper in the minutes after a heated argument with a loved one – that loss and pointlessness of the whole situation, summarised succinctly in the closing line, ‘_you make it difficult to be around you_‘. Check it out below.

There’s a real emotional rawness to the songwriting; it almost feels like spilling your heart onto paper in the minutes after a heated argument with a loved one – \[…\]
